title: Lalpaa lawmna in duh chuan
lyrics:
Lalpaa lawmna in duh chuan,
A rohlu chhiar rawh u;
Amah thu ring nghet chungin,
A tamzia ngaihtuah r'u.

A awm e, ngaihdamnate,
Thianghlimna leh pialral a awm;
Heng hi Isua zara ka ta.
Fakna lawm hlain
Amah thleng rawh se.

Sual tin Pathian hmangaihnain,
A ngaihdam vek ta a;
Ngaihdamna, inremna kan nei,
Isua thisen remna.

Hmangaihnain sual ngam turin,
Chakna min pe thin a;
Rilruah Thlarau Thianghlimin,
Sual a tireh thin a.

Pathian hnenah mite hruaina,
Thlarauvin min pe a;
Amah kan Lalpa min pek kha,
Kan thinlungah a cheng.

Rinin malsawmnate kan chang,
Rinna naupang takin;
Pathianin Krista zarah chuan,
Min pek a tiam a ni.
